operation.expression: <tMultiDataAccessRequest> <sqlStatement> <statementId>BIGID_CAM_CA_VW</statementId> <statement>SELECT AMEMBER_CARD_NUMBER,'CAMP01US_Views' as SOURCE, 'CAMP01US_Views.CREDITACCOUNT_BIGID.BIGID_CAM_CA_VW' as FULLOBJECTNAME,'rdb-record' as ROW_TYPE,CAST(sys_guid() as VARCHAR2(1000)) as proximityId FROM CREDITACCOUNT_BIGID.BIGID_CAM_CA_VW WHERE AMEMBER_CARD_NUMBER =?</statement> <parameter> <sqlType>string</sqlType> <data>{$temp.CAMP01US_CARNBR}</data> </parameter> </sqlStatement> <sqlStatement> <statementId>BIGID_CAM_REBATE_VW</statementId> <statement>SELECT CREDIT_PARTNER_REBATE_KEY,DISPLAY_ACCOUNT_NUMBER,REBATE_AMOUNT,REDEMPTION_MEMBER,SS_CUSTOMER_ID,'CAMP01US_Views' as SOURCE, 'CAMP01US_Views.CREDITACCOUNT_BIGID.BIGID_CAM_REBATE_VW' as FULLOBJECTNAME,'rdb-record' as ROW_TYPE,CAST(sys_guid() as VARCHAR2(1000)) as proximityId FROM CREDITACCOUNT_BIGID.BIGID_CAM_REBATE_VW WHERE REDEMPTION_MEMBER = ? OR SS_CUSTOMER_ID = ?</statement> <parameter> <sqlType>string</sqlType> <data>{$temp.CAMP01US_CARNBR}</data> </parameter> <parameter> <sqlType>string</sqlType> <data>{$temp.CAMP01US_MSPIPK}</data> </parameter> </sqlStatement> <sqlStatement> <statementId>BIGID_CAM_AUTO_RENEW_VW</statementId> <statement>SELECT DISPLAY_ACCOUNT_NUMBER,PAYEE_SS_MEMBER_ACCOUNT_ID,PAYER_SS_CUSTOMER_ID,'CAMP01US_Views' as SOURCE, 'CAMP01US_Views.CREDITACCOUNT_BIGID.BIGID_CAM_AUTO_RENEW_VW' as FULLOBJECTNAME,'rdb-record' as ROW_TYPE,CAST(sys_guid() as VARCHAR2(1000)) as proximityId FROM CREDITACCOUNT_BIGID.BIGID_CAM_AUTO_RENEW_VW WHERE PAYEE_SS_MEMBER_ACCOUNT_ID = ? OR PAYER_SS_CUSTOMER_ID = ?</statement> <parameter> <sqlType>string</sqlType> <data>{$temp.CAMP01US_ACCIPK}</data> </parameter> <parameter> <sqlType>string</sqlType> <data>{$temp.CAMP01US_MSPIPK}</data> </parameter> </sqlStatement> <sqlStatement> <statementId>BIGID_CAM_CC_VW</statementId> <statement>SELECT ACCOUNT_HOLDER_MSPIPK,ACCOUNT_HOLDER_NAME,BILLING_ADDRESS_CITY,BILLING_ADDRESS_COUNTRY_CODE,BILLING_ADDRESS_LINE1,BILLING_ADDRESS_LINE2,BILLING_ADDRESS_LINE3,BILLING_ADDRESS_POSTAL_CODE,BILLING_ADDRESS_STATE_CODE,BRAND_CODE,CREDIT_CARD_EXP_MONTH,CREDIT_CARD_EXP_YEAR,DISPLAY_ACCOUNT_NUMBER,SS_CUSTOMER_ID, 'CAMP01US_Views' as SOURCE, 'CAMP01US_Views.CREDITACCOUNT_BIGID.BIGID_CAM_CC_VW' as FULLOBJECTNAME,'rdb-record' as ROW_TYPE,CAST(sys_guid() as VARCHAR2(1000)) as proximityId FROM CREDITACCOUNT_BIGID.BIGID_CAM_CC_VW WHERE SS_CUSTOMER_ID = ?</statement> <parameter> <sqlType>string</sqlType> <data>{$temp.CAMP01US_MSPIPK}</data> </parameter> </sqlStatement> <dataSource>DS1</dataSource> </tMultiDataAccessRequest>

let $x:=$output.multiDataAccessResponse return <records> { for $i in $x/result/row/*[name()!='SOURCE' and name()!='FULLOBJECTNAME' and name()!='ROW_TYPE' and name()!='PROXIMITYID'] let $source:=$i/../SOURCE/text() let $table_name:=$i/../FULLOBJECTNAME/text() let $row_type:=$i/../ROW_TYPE/text() let $proximityId:=$i/../PROXIMITYID/text() return <records> <attribute>{$i/name()}</attribute> <value>{$i/text()}</value> <source>{$source}</source> <fullObjectName>{$table_name}</fullObjectName> <row_type>{$row_type}</row_type> <detected_at>{fn:current-date()}</detected_at> <shortFieldName>{$i/name()}</shortFieldName> <proximityId>{$proximityId}</proximityId> </records> }
</records>
